ofRectangle

ofRectangle class contains information about how a rectangle is in openFrameworks. Basically the class contains the position and the size of a rectangle.

class methods

  • ofRectangle()
  • ~ofRectangle()
  • ofRectangle(...)
  • set(...)
  • setFromCenter(...)
  • getCenter()
  • inside(...)
  • operator=(...)
  • operator==(...)
  • operator!=(...)
  • operator+(...)

class variables

  • float x
  • float y
  • float width
  • float height
